This is a sample document for testing purposes.

Page 1 Content:
This document contains sample text that will be used for testing the DocuRAG system.
It includes multiple paragraphs and sections to simulate a real document.

The main topic of this document is machine learning and artificial intelligence.
Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn
and make decisions from data without being explicitly programmed.

Key concepts include:
- Supervised learning
- Unsupervised learning  
- Reinforcement learning
- Neural networks
- Deep learning

Page 2 Content:
Applications of machine learning include:
- Natural language processing
- Computer vision
- Recommendation systems
- Fraud detection
- Autonomous vehicles

The field continues to evolve rapidly with new techniques and applications
being developed regularly. This makes it an exciting area of study and research.

Conclusion:
Machine learning represents a significant advancement in computer science
and has the potential to transform many industries and aspects of daily life.
